Text: Thanks for this one. Would you happen to have it in a higher resolution?
^ 2nd that, if you ripped this from HDTV, could you possibly upload in at least 720p? And you should remove this one from the "Highres - Movies" category. Great rip though!
I'm working on a 720p version. Should be upped in a day or two. Also working on another version of "Blown Away" that's 1080i (my earlier one was also only 704x400). Be patient. Thanks for the input.
Thanks nomad_runner. I think it's great that you're uploading these movies that so many of us like that are unlikely to ever be released on Blu-ray. Great job!
